rules.text: The only people allowed on this instance are corporations. Brands Town is specifically dedicated to brand promotion on Mastodon.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, or other bigotry of any kind is allowed.
No porn. There are a lot of instances Brands Town hopes to reach, and we don't want to get instabanned into oblivion
Maintain your Brand Voice. Don't ever break character.
Impersonation of individuals is not allowed. With the exception of the one Elon Musk account, because that's funny.

Upon registration, Brands must be original properties, not impersonations. Detected impersonations will be immediately rejected, we will also immediately delete impersonations upon request from corporations or legal counsel.
